summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York forwarding a subpoena for Michael Kearins to an investigator, indicating collaboration on an investigation.

persons.name: Michael Kearins
persons.context: The individual for whom a subpoena has been issued, as indicated in the email subject and attachment.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, who is providing a subpoena and offering to collaborate on an investigation.

connections.description: The prosecutor is issuing a subpoena to Michael Kearins as part of an investigation.

events.title: Subpoena issued to Michael Kearins
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a subpoena for Michael Kearins to an investigator, indicating an ongoing investigation.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued for Michael Kearins on August 20, 2019.
The subpoena was sent by an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates collaboration between the prosecutor's office and investigators on an investigation involving Michael Kearins.
